pageContext.claim: “Last year in the region, ICE arrested more than 6,000 criminal aliens. That's in your region, charged or convicted of heinous crimes, including rape and murder. Biden would set them all free. That's what they're looking to do.”
pageContext.analysis: No, Biden is calling for a 100-day moratorium on deportations and continued enforcement of immigration law. He has said he would return to the Obama-era policy of prioritizing gang members and those convicted of violent crimes -- a policy Trump rescinded shortly before he began to separate families at the border. Many of the people ICE arrests and Trump calls "criminal aliens" are convicted of immigration offenses, not "rape and murder" or such violent crimes.
